## HighlightOutline.serialize() method

Serialize the outlines into the PDF page coordinate system.

**Signature:**

```typescript
serialize(bbox: [blX: string, blY: string, trX: string, trY: string], rotation: number): Array<Array<number>>;
```

</td><td>

</td><td>
